skillTree.localised_description: The palanquins of Nurgle are ornate thrones decorated in mouldering finery and decaying cushions.
A colossal Daemon-insect, whose appearance is so repugnant it leaves festering scars upon the mind.
The Fly Lord and his devotees despise Tzeentch, for his obsession with schemes and trickery are the polar opposite of Nurgle's delight in slow, musty stagnation.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

skillTree.localised_description: Anything fired at this vile Nurglish servant's immense girth must penetrate many folds of sweaty fat before they even have the slightest chance of piercing his flesh.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs single and multiple units

skillTree.localised_description: Grandfather Nurgle has a nauseating surprise in store for you...
Nurgle’s chosen are supernaturally resilient.
The Lord of Pestilence loves each and every one of his children.
We leave only burning houses behind.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Miasma of Pestilence"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Miasma of Pestilence Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Miasma of Pestilence Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Stream of Corruption"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Stream of Corruption Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Stream of Corruption Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 1% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 2% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 4% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Always watching.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Unusually subtle for one so foul, this one is skilled in spreading Nurgle's insanitary ways and words across the land.

effects.description:
Attrition: +25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(enemy armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one finds the enemy can barely stand to come near them, let alone attack.
When this one's countless lesions and warts finish weeping and harden up, a natural, protective carapace is left behind in their place.
If a population are confined to their toilets or beds at home they're not able to spread dissent and sedition as readily, if at all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ogres aside, being this large and ungainly would almost certainly kill most other creatures, but when you're beloved of the Urfather it is actually an advantage.
Other will also feel it.
Arrows will break.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 5% for Plaguebearers of Nurgle and Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Nurglings hordes never end.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Nurglings units
	(all units in army)

Armour: +5 for Nurglings units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Let them come.
Lands will rot.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 when defending 
	(all units in army)
